effect.sun_moon: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.

short_effect.sun_moon: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
